inclusion.criterion: Fever with or without respiratory symptoms
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Comorbidity (diabetes, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, chronic renal disease, neoplasia, immunosuppression including HIV infection, chronic heart failure or cirrhosis)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Previous failure or allergy to macrolides or quinolones
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 63-year-old man presenting with acute urinary retention and a large prostate. He has normal recent blood chemistry and urinalysis results.
